attributes.action: Keep Safety Critical Guards / Conductors on ALL train Passenger services.
attributes.background: Rail companies are de staffing the railways in order to maximise profits for their shareholders at the expense of their staff & passengers. We need to stop this greed & keep trains & stations safe, manned so the safe & good service you require is paramount. Train jobs but Your safety!

rejection.details: You could start a new petition calling on the Government to ensure that all rail franchises include a commitment to retain guards on passenger trains.
